name: Mgiełka do twarzy i ciała
shortDescription: Delikatna mgiełka została stworzona, aby intensywnie nawilżyć i odświeżyć skórę oraz przygotować ją do aplikacji Kolagenu Naturalnego w formie żelu. Kosmetyk regeneruje i wygładza ciało, przywracając świeżość oraz młodzieńczy blask. Regularne stosowanie produktu sprawia, że skóra jest ujędrniona i wyraźnie odżywiona. Mgiełka zawiera substancje występujące w naskórku jako składniki Naturalnego Czynnika Nawilżającego (NMF) tj. mocznik, PCA, sole kwasu mlekowego oraz aminokwasy. Bogactwo substancji nawilżających i odżywczych zapewnia skórze komfort, wygładzenie i uelastycznienie. Ten wyjątkowy produkt zawiera również Kolagen, który zwiększa zdolność skóry do wiązania wody, jednocześnie zapobiegając utracie wilgoci.
description:
Kosmetyk:

  •  Nawilża i długotrwale odżywia skórę.
  •  Chroni naskórek przed utratą wilgoci.
  •  Koi podrażnienia.
  •  Ujędrnia oraz wygładza cerę.
  •  Przygotowuje skórę do aplikacji Kolagenu Naturalnego.

Mgiełka zawiera czynnik nawilżający, który stanowi wyjątkowe połączenie komponentów, które utrzymują prawidłowy bilans wodny skóry. Chroni ją przed nadmiernym wysuszeniem i utratą wilgoci, zapobiegając pojawianiu się zmarszczek. Moisturizing factor jest kompleksem niezwykle cennych substancji rekonstruujących.

name: Serum With Vitamins A+E
shortDescription: Our special formula recommended for eye care. Collagen serum with vitamins A + E contains more collagen. The amount of natural collagen has been increased by 10%. Our serum is enriched with two valuable ingredients for the healthy appearance of the skin vitamin A and vitamin E. They are powerful antioxidants and are in the shape of spheres that are only released upon the contact with skin.
description:
Effects:

  • Visible effect of rejuvenation around the eyes.
  • Reduces the visibility of wrinkles.
  • Active protection against premature aging of the skin around the eyes.
  • Care for demanding and very delicate skin around the eyes.
  • Moisturizes, smoothes and firms the skin and restores a youthful glow and radiance.

 

Active Ingredients:

  • Vitamin A
  • Vitamin E
  • Natural Collagen

name: Peeling Cream
shortDescription: Our peeling cream is intended for the treatment of any skin type. A creamy consistency prevents irritation and dryness. Our fine natural peeling particles, derived from the heart of Polynesian lagoons, gently exfoliate the skin and improve microcirculation. This product smoothes the skin and prepares it for better absorption ofother ingredients. Perfectly selected ingredients nourish, regenerate,moisturize, soothe and smooth the skin. Our peeling cream helpsyour skin to regain its natural color, freshness and radiance. Applied regularly it helps maintain healthy and clean skin.
description:
Effects:

  • Gently cleanses and exfoliates dead skin.
  • Improves skin tone and brightens discolorations.
  • Nourishes, moisturizes and firms.
  • Soothes and rejuvenates the skin.

 

Active Ingredients:

  • Vitamin E
  • Avocadol (special complex of Avocado)
  • Hydromanil™
  • Aloe Vera extract
  • Natural Collagen
  • Pink sand of Tikehau (exfoliating material)
  • Borage oil

name: Vitalizing Milk
shortDescription: An extremely mild lotion for make-up removal, designed for anyskin type, especially for sensitive and demanding skin. A delicate product formulated on exceptionally mild, specially selected ingredients that is very well tolerated by the skin. Our Collagen Vitalizing Milk contains many valuable active ingredients.This rich formula gives our cosmetic exceptional performance.Our vitalizing milk removes impurities while providing a unique feeling of comfort. It regulates the function of skin and soothes irritation.Moisturizes and nourishes the skin while restoring its natural tone and firmness. Prepares the skin for further treatments.
description:
Effects:

name: Lip Gloss
shortDescription: The skin of the lips is very delicate and thin, which makes it particularly exposed to adverse weather conditions such as solar radiation, wind and frost. All of these factors strongly irritate the skin, therefore there appear signs of dehydration, such as minor cracks and flaking of the skin. To effectively protect the lips they should be moisturized, lubricated and nourish at the same time. Bearing in mind the specific requirements of the lips area we have created a formula rich in ingredients providing both rich moisturizing and comfortable lubrication. Additionally, the ingredients contained in the „ Souvre Internationale” lip gloss significantly restore the lip’s protective barier, protecting them from drying and at the same time strongly smoothing and regenerating them.
description:
Effects:

  • Intensively regenerates and nourishes the lips
  • Restores comfortable and long-lasting hydration
  • Immediately soothes and rejuvenates the skin of your lips
  • Lips become velvety soft and sensually delicte
  • Protects lips against photo-aging and dehydration
  • Gives your lips a nice shine and beautiful appearance

 

Active Ingredients:

  • Natural collagen
  • Shea butter
  • Vitamin E
  • Squalane
  • Hydromide blend
  • Jojoba oil
  • D-panthenol

description:
Effects:

name: Under Eye Serum
shortDescription: Our delicate cream is designed for anti-wrinkle treatment of the delicate and sensitive skin around the eyes. Our eye serum is rich in Natural Collagen, Pepha®-Tight and Moist 24TM with unique moisturizing, firming and stimulating properties. Our cream gently improves microcirculation, eliminates puffiness and dark circles under the eyes, noticeably reduces wrinkles. Our cream revitalizes and restores the skin taking into account the particular sensitivity of this area. From the first application the skin around the eyes becomes hydrated, radiant and smooth. It gives the eyesa radiant glow.
description:
Effects:

  • Active protection against premature aging of the skin around the eyes.

name: Body Slimming Serum
shortDescription: This product is designed to fight cellulite, an aesthetic flaw that vexes nearly every woman. Despite a delicate and velvety consistency, our product is a powerful enemy againstcellulite, a problem afflicting almost 95% of women after puberty. of women after puberty. Our Slimming Body Serum is a product with a delicate fragrance and the color of cappucino. The problem of cellulite affecting women forced us to investigate the causes of this defect and led us to the development of active ingredients that provide our customers with maximum results.
description:

name: Conditioner
shortDescription: Our strengthening conditioner for hair contains Natural Collagen, which has a positive effect on the condition of the scalp and hair, and gives your hair a natural shine and softness. The presence of natural fatty alcohols in our conditioner has beneficial effect on the hydration and smoothing of hair. The active derivative of keratin comprehensively and perfectly reconstructs the structure of damaged hair, and peptides contained in the nutrient perfectly complement the natural structure of the hair. This allows extremely effective regeneration, and regular use of our conditioner ensures beautiful and manageable hair.
description:
Effects:

This product is specially recommended for people confronted with the problem of dried, hardened and calloused skin and cracking heels. A high concentration of urea significantly improves hydration and regulates exfoliation, softening and prevents the formation of new callousing.

It helps to restore and maintain a natural hydro-lipid balance of the epidermis, and its proper pH.It has antibacterial, strengthening and stimulating properties,and is hypoallergenic.

name: Shampoo
shortDescription: A mild shampoo for washing all types of hair. Especially recommended for weak and brittle hair, damaged by UV styling treatments which require special care. The high content of Natural Collagen in our shampoo strengthens the structure of hair, regenerates damaged ends and prevents split ends. It contains active ingredients which nourish the hair restoring its elasticity, radiance and visually increase the volume of hair, while extending its durability. Our product gives your hair a shinny and  healthy appearance while not burdening the hair. It can be used daily and does not contain salt.
description:
